prompts.description: Recommend appropriate consulting frameworks based on challenge type and context

input_parameters.name: challenge_description
input_parameters.description: Description of the business challenge or question

output_format.recommended_frameworks: array of framework objects with code, name, rationale, and fit_score
output_format.selection_rationale: text explaining why these frameworks fit the challenge

prompts.description: Guide consulting engagement through discovery, assessment, recommendations, and roadmap phases

output_format.phase_guidance: detailed guidance for current phase activities
output_format.key_questions: array of questions to address in current phase

prompts.description: Apply strategic frameworks to analyze business situations

input_parameters.name: framework_code
input_parameters.description: Framework code to apply (e.g., SWOT, PORTER_5F, PESTEL)

input_parameters.name: subject
input_parameters.description: Subject of analysis (company, product, market, etc.)

input_parameters.name: context_data
input_parameters.description: Relevant data and context for the analysis

output_format.key_insights: array of key insights from the analysis

prompts.description: Apply prioritization methods to rank initiatives or features

input_parameters.name: items
input_parameters.description: Array of items to prioritize with relevant attributes

input_parameters.name: criteria_weights
input_parameters.description: Custom weights for criteria (for Weighted Matrix)

output_format.prioritized_list: array of items with scores and rankings
output_format.scoring_details: detailed breakdown of how each item was scored
